TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit GCSettings extends System.Object
public ref class GCSettings abstract sealed

summary.span: 指定目前處理序的記憶體回收設定。

span.span: Specifies the garbage collection settings for the current process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷目前的處理序是否已啟用伺服器記憶體回收。Use the property to determine whether server garbage collection is enabled for the current process.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property IsServerGC As Boolean
public: static property bool IsServerGC { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示伺服器記憶體回收是否已啟用。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether server garbage collection is enabled.

value.span: 如果伺服器記憶體回收已啟用，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if server garbage collection is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 伺服器記憶體回收的相關資訊，請參閱中的 「 工作站和伺服器記憶體回收 > 一節[Fundamentals of Garbage Collection](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/fundamentals.md)。For information about server garbage collection, see the "Workstation and Server Garbage Collection" section in [Fundamentals of Garbage Collection](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/fundamentals.md). 如果未啟用伺服器記憶體回收，工作站記憶體回收是作用中 （或不同時回收）。If server garbage collection is not enabled, workstation garbage collection is in effect (with or without concurrent collection). 只有在多處理器電腦上使用伺服器記憶體回收。Server garbage collection is available only on multiprocessor computers. 受管理的主機可以要求伺服器記憶體回收，而且主機要求會覆寫組態檔設定。An unmanaged host can request server garbage collection, and the host request overrides configuration file settings. 如果主機未指定的記憶體回收的類型，您可以使用組態檔設定來指定伺服器記憶體回收。If the host does not specify the type of garbage collection, you can use a configuration file setting to specify server garbage collection. 此設定只能在應用程式組態檔中，不在電腦組態檔中是有效 (請參閱[設定應用程式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/86bd26d3-737e-4484-9782-19b17f34cd1f))。This setting is valid only in the application configuration file, not in the machine configuration file (see [Configuring Apps](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/86bd26d3-737e-4484-9782-19b17f34cd1f)). 下列範例會顯示啟用伺服器記憶體回收的範例應用程式組態檔的內容。The following example shows the contents of a sample application configuration file that enables server garbage collection. ``` ``` ## Examples 下列範例會指出是否在主機電腦正在使用伺服器或工作站記憶體回收。The following example indicates whether the host computer is using server or workstation garbage collection. [!code-csharp[Environment.IsServerGC#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.IsServerGC/CS/isg.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Environment.IsServerGC#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/environment.IsServerGC/VB/isg.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Property LargeObjectHeapCompactionMode As GCLargeObjectHeapCompactionMode

public: static property System::Runtime::GCLargeObjectHeapCompactionMode LargeObjectHeapCompactionMode { System::Runtime::GCLargeObjectHeapCompactionMode get(); void set(System::Runtime::GCLargeObjectHeapCompactionMode value); };

summary.span: [在 .NET Framework 4.5.1 及更新版本中支援]

span.span: [Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.1 and later versions]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示完整的封鎖記憶體回收是否壓縮大型物件堆積 (LOH)。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a full blocking garbage collection compacts the large object heap (LOH).

value.span: 其中一個表示完整封鎖記憶體回收是否壓縮 LOH 的列舉值。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates whether a full blocking garbage collection compacts the LOH.

remarks.format: ## Remarks LOH 用於需要多個 85,000 個位元組的大型物件 （例如陣列） 所配置的記憶體。The LOH is used for allocating memory for large objects (such as arrays) that require more than 85,000 bytes. 複製大型區塊的記憶體的效能影響，因為記憶體回收行程通常掃 LOH，包括建立一份無作用物件所佔據的而且可以重複滿足未來的要求使用的記憶體位置大型物件的記憶體配置。Because of the performance impact of copying large blocks of memory, the garbage collector ordinarily sweeps the LOH, which involves creating a list of the memory locations that were occupied by dead objects and that can be reused to satisfy future requests for allocation of memory for large objects. 不過，進行廣泛的應用程式中使用的 LOH 儲存暫時性物件，分散也造成負面影響效能的記憶體。However, in apps that make extensive use of the LOH to store transient objects, memory fragmentation can also adversely impact performance. 在此情況下，便可使用至精簡而不是只需掃掠 LOH 記憶體回收期間的屬性。In this case, it is possible to use the property to compact rather than simply sweep the LOH during a garbage collection. 預設值屬性是，表示在記憶體回收期間不會壓縮 LOH。The default value of the property is , which indicates that the LOH is not compacted during garbage collections. 如果您指派屬性值為、 LOH 會在下一個完整封鎖記憶體回收期間，壓縮和屬性值會重設為。If you assign the property a value of , the LOH is compacted during the next full blocking garbage collection, and the property value is reset to . > [!NOTE] > 背景記憶體回收不會封鎖。Background garbage collections are not blocking. 這表示，如果您設定屬性、 任何背景層代 2 回收，會發生後續不會壓縮 LOH。This means that, if you set the property to , any background generation 2 collections that occur subsequently do not compact the LOH. 只有第一個封鎖層代 2 收集壓縮 LOH。Only the first blocking generation 2 collection compacts the LOH. 之後屬性設定為下, 一個完整封鎖記憶體回收 （和壓縮 LOH），就會發生在不確定的未來時間。After the property is set to , the next full blocking garbage collection (and compaction of the LOH) occurs at an indeterminate future time. 您可以立即壓縮 LOH，使用程式碼如下所示：You can compact the LOH immediately by using code like the following: [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.GCSettings#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.gcsettings/cs/lohcompactionmode1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.GCSettings#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.gcsettings/vb/lohcompactionmode1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Runtime.GCLatencyMode LatencyMode { get; set; }
Public Shared Property LatencyMode As GCLatencyMode
public: static property System::Runtime::GCLatencyMode LatencyMode { System::Runtime::GCLatencyMode get(); void set(System::Runtime::GCLatencyMode value); };

summary.span: 為記憶體回收取得或設定目前的延遲模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the current latency mode for garbage collection.

value.span: 其中一個列舉值，指定延遲模式。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the latency mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您也可以設定您的應用程式中減少記憶體回收的干擾程度的層級至期間重要的作業。You can reduce the level of intrusiveness of garbage collection in your application by setting the to during critical operations. 這類作業都完成後，返回較高的延遲模式，使多個物件，可以增加記憶體回收。After such operations are completed, return to a higher latency mode so that more objects can be reclaimed to increase memory. 一般情況下，您可以設定的值屬性可定義記憶體回收行程的延遲模式。Ordinarily, you set the value of the property to define the garbage collector's latency mode. 不過，您無法設定無 GC 區域延遲模式，藉由指派列舉值，以屬性。However, you cannot set the no GC region latency mode by assigning the enumeration value to the property. 請改為呼叫方法開始無 GC 區域延遲模式，而且您呼叫來結束該處理序。Instead, you call the method to begin the no GC region latency mode, and you call the to end it. 請參閱[延遲模式](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/latency.md)如需如何回收的執行階段組態設定會影響的預設值的討論列舉型別。See [Latency Modes](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/latency.md) for a discussion of how the runtime configuration settings for garbage collection affect the default value of the enumeration.

span.span: The property is being set to an invalid value.
The property cannot be set to .

permission.span: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
